lines.text: I need to borrow the Rolls.
Hey, you kill that Snow White son-of-a-bitch, you can have the Rolls!
I might take you up on that.
Be it ever so humble, there's no place like a three-and-a-half million dollar home!
Haven't you ever heard of cholesterol?
Yeah, it's the stuff they put in red meat that makes it taste good.
What's a boomerang that dosen't come back ?It's a Stick.
Why don't you push real hard... you may hit the water.
